title: Agents Fall in Love with Iguassu Falls, Brazil
text:
Last updated: 12:45   Agents Fall in Love with Iguassu Falls, Brazil Travel Agent | Tom Bastek | October 01, 2015 
Photo by Eugene Kang 
Agents lucky enough to attend the Iguassu Falls presentation in the afternoon at the Agent@Home Travel Summit were able to take away an abundance of great information regarding a destination that may not be top of mind when a client thinks about going to Brazil. < Do you want to read the full story? You must be a registered travel professional with an active account to view the full story. Are you a Travel Agent? Log in to your account now, or register for free!
